typeOfOperator1.ts(3,5): error TS2322: Type '"bigint" | "boolean" | "function" | "number" | "object" | "string" | "symbol" | "undefined"' is not assignable to type 'number'.
  Type '"bigint"' is not assignable to type 'number'.


==== typeOfOperator1.ts (1 errors) ====
    var x = 1;
    var y: string = typeof x;
    var z: number = typeof x;
        ~
!!! error TS2322: Type '"bigint" | "boolean" | "function" | "number" | "object" | "string" | "symbol" | "undefined"' is not assignable to type 'number'.
